sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import request from '../../utils/request' import Header from '../header/Header' import SideNav from '../sideNav/SideNav' import {makePaginationButtons} from '../../utils/utils' function PlanDetails() { let [state, setState] = useState([]) let [userCount, setUserCount] = useState([]) let [page,setPage] = useState({limit:10,pgno:1,count:0 }) useEffect(()=>{ request('GET','/auth/getUser', { params: { limit:page.limit,pgno:page.pgno } }).then(res=>{ if(res.data.success){ setState(res.data.user) setPage({...page,count:res.data.count}) } }) }, [setState,page.pgno]) function setPgno(pgno){ setPage({...page, pgno}) } useEffect(() => { request('GET', '/auth/getUserCount') .then(res => { if (res.data.success) { setUserCount(res.data) } }) }, [setUserCount]) let paginationButtons = page.count ? makePaginationButtons(Math.ceil(page.count/page.limit), page.pgno, setPgno):[] return ( <>
Your Most Recent Plan
Free

{userCount.dev_count}

Standard

{userCount.stand_count}

Business

{userCount.premi_count}

Enterprise

{userCount.enter_count}

{ state.map((user, key) => { let plan = ''; user.plan_number === 1 ? plan = 'Developer' : user.plan_number === 2 ? plan = 'Standard' : user.plan_number === 3 ? plan = 'Business' : user.plan_number === 4 ? plan = 'Enterprise': plan = '---'; return }) }
User ID Plan Name Email Action
{user.user_id} {plan} {user.email}
{ paginationButtons }
); } export default PlanDetails;
